definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: A new method has been developed for analysing assay of glycerin in moisturizing cream.
sentences.chinese: 建立了保湿霜中甘油的分析方法。

sentences.english: How many is that the moisture-preserving powder cake of Diao congealed fat special counter replaces the core price?
sentences.chinese: 迪奥凝脂保湿粉饼专柜替芯的价格是多少呀？

sentences.english: Your hands and nails will stay moisturized for hours.
sentences.chinese: 这样，你的手和指甲会保湿好几个小时。

sentences.english: To fight skin dryness, Jeannie moisturizes twice a day.
sentences.chinese: 为了对抗肌肤干燥，吉妮一天保湿两次。

sentences.english: Can I use Eucerin body moisturizers on my hands?
sentences.chinese: 我可以用优色林身体保湿霜擦手吗？

sentences.english: Skin feels very soft and hydrated after application.
sentences.chinese: 皮肤感觉非常软和保湿。

sentences.english: The Moisturizing Shaving System is equipped with a dual blade system to give you an ultra close shave.
sentences.chinese: 剃的保湿系统，配备了双刀片系统给你一个超近距离。

sentences.english: Infuse skin with fresh, oil-free hydration all day, see it glow with health.
sentences.chinese: 为皮肤注入大量保湿成分，清爽不油腻，滋润一整天。

sentences.english: A thick-whipped elegant moisturizing cream for cleansing and facial make-up removal.
sentences.chinese: 用于洁面和脸部卸妆的一种浓厚的保湿霜状产品。

sentences.english: Polydextrose can act as a humectant in these kind of recipes.
sentences.chinese: 聚葡萄糖可以在这些配方中担当一种保湿剂。

sentences.english: Mixed with moisturizing ingredients to maintain skin Hydra silk slip.
sentences.chinese: 混合有保湿成分，维持肌肤水润丝滑。

sentences.english: Collagen and mucopolysaccharide give the skin moisturizer and firming effect.
sentences.chinese: 胶原蛋白与黏多糖体供给肌肤保湿成分与紧肤效果。

sentences.english: It moist, nourishes, renews and replenishes our skin cells, makes our skins beccoming more delicates and soft.
sentences.chinese: 保湿滋润，更新及修护皮肤细胞，让肌肤蜂细致柔嫩。

sentences.english: Honey extract, a natural humectant and emollient, conditions skin.
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜萃取物，天然保湿及润肤，条件肌肤。

sentences.english: The mask restores moisturizing properties to your skin helping rejuvenates new younger cells.
sentences.chinese: 产品的保湿功能促进活化年轻的新细胞。
